cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Natural Resources on November 17, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 5345, Saline Lake Ecosystems in the Great Basin States Program  Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 165 (Thursday, September 23, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. MOORE of Utah:
H.R. 5345.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1, Section 8, Clause 3 of the U.S. Constitution.
[Page H5134]

latestAction.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 418.

title: Saline Lake Ecosystems in the Great Basin States Program Act of 2021
